languages.text: "Ах, шерин, я знала, что твоя душа отзовется на зов великих строк! Как-нибудь я прочитаю тебе эту поэму, и ты скажешь: "О, Великий! Это же про нас!"
"Ah, shereen, I knew your soul would resonate with these great lines of verse! I will read you this poem one day and you will say, 'By the Exalted One! It's about us!'"
languages.original_text: "Ах, шерин, я знала, что твоя душа отзовется на зов великих строк! Как-нибудь я прочитаю тебе эту поэму, и ты скажешь: "О, Великий! Это же про нас!"

traits.locale_text: "Ah, shereen, I knew your soul would resonate with these great lines of verse! I will read you this poem one day and you will say, 'By the Exalted One! It's about us!'"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ah, shereen, I knew your soul would resonate with these great lines of verse! I will read you this poem one day and you will say, 'By the Exalted One! It's about us!'"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ah, shereen, I knew your soul would resonate with these great lines of verse! I will read you this poem one day and you will say, 'By the Exalted One! It's about us!'"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ah, shereen, I knew your soul would resonate with these great lines of verse! I will read you this poem one day and you will say, 'By the Exalted One! It's about us!'"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “啊，亲爱的，我就知道你的灵魂会与这些伟大的诗句产生共鸣！有朝一日，我会把这首诗读给你听，到时候你一定会说：‘至高无上的神皇啊！这写的不就是咱们嘛！’”
languages.original_text: "Ah, shereen, I knew your soul would resonate with these great lines of verse! I will read you this poem one day and you will say, 'By the Exalted One! It's about us!'"

traits.locale_text: “啊，亲爱的，我就知道你的灵魂会与这些伟大的诗句产生共鸣！有朝一日，我会把这首诗读给你听，到时候你一定会说：‘至高无上的神皇啊！这写的不就是咱们嘛！’”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「ああ、シャリーン、きっとあんたの魂がこの偉大な詩文に共鳴してくれると思ってたよ！あたし、いつかこの詩をあんたに詠んでやったら、「なんということだ！私達のことじゃないか！」って言うと思ってたのさ」
languages.original_text: "Ah, shereen, I knew your soul would resonate with these great lines of verse! I will read you this poem one day and you will say, 'By the Exalted One! It's about us!'"

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、シャリーン、きっとあんたの魂がこの偉大な詩文に共鳴してくれると思ってたよ！あたし、いつかこの詩をあんたに詠んでやったら、「なんということだ！私達のことじゃないか！」って言うと思ってたのさ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Ah, shereen, sabía que su alma resonaría con estos grandiosos versos! Algún día le leeré el poema y exclamará "¡Por el Exaltado, es sobre nosotr{mf|o|a}s!"».
languages.original_text: "Ah, shereen, I knew your soul would resonate with these great lines of verse! I will read you this poem one day and you will say, 'By the Exalted One! It's about us!'"

traits.locale_text: «¡Ah, shereen, sabía que su alma resonaría con estos grandiosos versos! Algún día le leeré el poema y exclamará "¡Por el Exaltado, es sobre nosotr{mf|o|a}s!"».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Ah, shereen, j'étais sûre que votre âme saurait apprécier cette jolie strophe à sa juste valeur ! Un jour, je vous lirai ce poème et vous vous exclamerez : "Par l'Exalté ! Mais c'est nous !" »
languages.original_text: "Ah, shereen, I knew your soul would resonate with these great lines of verse! I will read you this poem one day and you will say, 'By the Exalted One! It's about us!'"

traits.locale_text: « Ah, shereen, j'étais sûre que votre âme saurait apprécier cette jolie strophe à sa juste valeur ! Un jour, je vous lirai ce poème et vous vous exclamerez : "Par l'Exalté ! Mais c'est nous !" »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ah, Shereen, ich wusste, dass Eure Seele von diesen tollen Verszeilen zum Klingen gebracht würde! Irgendwann werde ich Euch das gesamte Gedicht vorlesen und dann werdet Ihr nicht anders können, als zu sagen: 'Beim Erhabenen! Wir sind damit gemeint!'"
languages.original_text: "Ah, shereen, I knew your soul would resonate with these great lines of verse! I will read you this poem one day and you will say, 'By the Exalted One! It's about us!'"

traits.locale_text: "Ah, Shereen, ich wusste, dass Eure Seele von diesen tollen Verszeilen zum Klingen gebracht würde! Irgendwann werde ich Euch das gesamte Gedicht vorlesen und dann werdet Ihr nicht anders können, als zu sagen: 'Beim Erhabenen! Wir sind damit gemeint!'"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Şirinim, bu muhteşem satırların ruhuna dokunacağını biliyordum! Bir gün bu şiiri okuduğumda 'Görkemli adına! Bizi anlatıyor!' diyeceksin."
languages.original_text: "Ah, shereen, I knew your soul would resonate with these great lines of verse! I will read you this poem one day and you will say, 'By the Exalted One! It's about us!'"

traits.locale_text: "Ah şirinim, bu muhteşem satırların ruhuna dokunacağını biliyordum! Bir gün bu şiiri okuyacağım ve 'Görkemli adına! Bizi anlatıyor!' diyeceksin."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
